snippet.title: I've put Mario 64 in Sonic Adventure
snippet.description:
Surprise!

This is a mod that allows you to play Mario from Super Mario 64 in Sonic Adventure DX. This isn't a character skin no, this mod has the exact same moveset and physics than the original 1996 game.

The mod requires a NTSC-U Rom and I'll let you use google for that. Please read carrefuly the GB mod page before installation.

In order to get audio to work: You need to disable Input Mod since the "Better Input SDL2" option in the Mod Manager settings totally replace it.

DL Link: https://gamebanana.com/mods/544238

Big thanks to Kell for his help and Traitor for all the small video tweaks!

Music:
Jump Up, Super Star! Remix- Super Mario Odyssey by The Living Tombstone

00:15 Boom

________________________________________________________
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sora_Yxow
► Twitch : https://www.twitch.tv/sora_yx
